title: A PSA to everyone complaining about URF
body: URF is meant to be for fun-if certain champs are unplayable against (Leona *cough cough*, perma stun *cough cough) it's kind of the nature of the game mode. There are always going to be broken champs in a game mode with largely reduced cooldowns (champions dependant on CDR). Just be glad that this isn't in ranked. Also, keep in mind, there are muchhhh more pressing issues Riot has to be addressing than game balance in a gamemode that comes around once in a blue moon.
